It's Overwatch. You know what you're getting into. If you've played TF2 or Paladins, or even the first Overwatch, it's not that different. 

Most of the negative reviews are reviews against Blizzard the company, which is understandable, as they are at an all-time low in terms of PR or goodwill. 

But the game itself, OW2, is fine. It runs well. It plays well. You don't need to pay anything to play PvP. You can still have a lot of fun without buying any cosmetics. You can unlock the heroes in-game without paying. 

If you don't want to play the game because of Blizzard the company, that's respectable. But if you don't want to play the game because all the negative reviews make you think this is a bad piece of software, then please reconsider. It's fun. It's frantic. It's Overwatch.
